intro: Psychotria niauensis, commonly known as the Niuafo'ou psychotria, is a flowering plant species native to the tropical regions of the South Pacific. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It is often found growing in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species.
